title: A nomogram to predict long COVID risk based on pre- and post-infection factors: Results from a cross-sectional study in South China
content:

Source: Public Health, Volume 237

Author(s): Meng Zhou, Qicheng Zhu, Yucheng Xu, Zhifeng Zhou, Congrui Guo, Zhiping Lin, Xinyi Zhang, Zhipeng Yang, Xueyun Li, Wei Lin
